BANK HOLIDAY: 30 May 2022 – USD payments paused
Bitstamp USD payments paused on Monday, 30 May 2022, due to the public holiday in the US.

Due to the upcoming public holiday in the US on Monday, 30 May 2022, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for incoming and outgoing USD payments will be paused.

USD deposits and withdrawals will be processed the next business day – on Tuesday, 31 May 2022.

EUR and GBP deposits and withdrawals will be processed without interruptions.

For any help, please contact us at support@bitstamp.net.
